content.html: Angry Old Toff: “They’re only serving vegetarian food at her wedding? There’s NO meat at all? That’s selfish. SELFISH! So selfish.” Translation: “Their strongly held belief that animals shouldn’t be killed for food is less important than my preference for eating meat EVERY meal”
content.value:
Angry Old Toff: “They’re only serving vegetarian food at her wedding? There’s NO meat at all? That’s selfish. SELFISH! So selfish.”

Translation: “Their strongly held belief that animals shouldn’t be killed for food is less important than my preference for eating meat EVERY meal”
